rules_text:
[i]Origin[/i] – As Kris, Unsung Hero enters, choose a color and creature type. She becomes that creature type and color in addition to her other types and colors.
[i]Present[/i] – Whenever Kris attacks, if you control a creature with the same chosen type and color, she gains double strike until end of turn. If that creature is also attacking the same player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature attacking that player.
[i]Future[/i] – When Kris leaves the battlefield, support 3. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)[/i]
